item.title: ASML boss cites ‘Moore’s Law’ for DeepSeek optimism as he warns investors to get ready for more AI ‘elephants in the room’
item.description: ASML offset losses from Monday's stock market wipeout as its CEO welcomed the arrival of cheaper AI models.

item.title: Food giant Sysco’s CEO says bird flu will keep egg prices high
item.description: The company also weighed in on the price of proteins like beef and chicken.

item.title: Los Angeles VCs unite to launch LA Tech Community Cares Fund for fire recovery
item.description: In Los Angeles, the venture community has banded together, launching The LA Tech Community Cares Fund to support fire recovery efforts.

item.title: Trump federal funding freeze temporarily blocked by federal judge
item.description: U.S. District Judge Loren L. AliKhan blocked the funding freeze only minutes before it was scheduled to take effect.

item.title: Companies like Costco and Apple are defending their DEI programs despite nationwide pushback—These are the companies standing by their policies
